text: "Walkin' After Midnight" is a 1957 song by country singer Patsy Cline and it was taken from self-titled album Patsy Cline. It went to number 12 in the United States and number 33 in Australia. It went to number 2 on the Billboard Hot Country singles chart. == Track listing == 7" vinyl single * "Walkin' After Midnight" – 2:32 * "A Poor Man's Roses (Or a Rich Man's Gold)" – 2:45 == References == Category:1957 songs Category:Country songs Category:Patsy Cline songs
title: Walkin' After Midnight
